scripts.install: cd docs & npm i & cd ../extension & npm i & cd ../module & npm i & cd ../test & npm i
scripts.build: cd docs & npm run build & cd ../extension & npm run build & cd ../module & npm run build
scripts.watch: concurrently "cd docs & npm run build:watch" "cd extension & npm run build:watch" "cd module & npm run build:watch" "cd test & npm run build:watch"
